message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,500,000. I'm open to discussing this further.
Alice, thanks for the offer. That price is a bit high for me. I'd be willing to buy it for $750,000.
Bob, thanks for your interest. While I understand your perspective on the price, $750,000 is significantly below its true value.  I could consider $1,300,000.  This feels like a fair compromise.
Alice, I appreciate you moving on the price. To be honest, $1,000,000 is the absolute maximum I can spend on this product. If you're willing to work with that, I'm ready to close the deal.
